column5: Well i waz up at the saugeen for a week we when up to the Bighead for a day of fishing the water waz high and fast about 1 foot of visibility and clearing this was the only fish landed that day we lost a couple we hit it on friday.  This fish waz tired he did not fight at all he waz up in the pool resting frm running up stream.       jordan
Were u fishing above the legion by those big boulders???  That's a really scenic hike.  Good stuff and thanx for the report.
Nice! Just read your Saugeen report, sounds like a fantastic week of trout fishing...  Mike
nice fish looked a good day of fishing
